attributes.action: Random drugs test on members of parliament.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that George Osbornes erratic behaviour needs more transparent scrutiny. His bizarre behaviour while carol singing caused me some concern. His eyes were glazed and his jaw was gurning.
attributes.background: I believe that George Osbornes erratic behaviour needs more transparent scrutiny. I would like parliament to consider mandatory drug tests on all members of parliament before entering the building.
